selectedVerses.text: When Pharaoh was angry with his servants and put me and the chief baker in custody in the house of the captain of the guard,
And Pharaoh was angry with his two officers, the chief cupbearer and the chief baker,
They are all adulterers; they are like a heated oven whose baker ceases to stir the fire, from the kneading of the dough until it is leavened.
Some time after this, the cupbearer of the king of Egypt and his baker committed an offense against their lord the king of Egypt.
But he hanged the chief baker, as Joseph had interpreted to them.
